content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) connected to wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items to stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving items to storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Secondary Mining Operation at (-18, -53)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53) connected to wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items to stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving items to storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by multiple pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric network with multiple poles powering the facility

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) for copper plates
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) feeding assembling machine
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving output to chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Additional storage chest at (6.5, 14.5)

### Research Lab System
- Lab with automation science pack input
- Currently researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors when chest is empty
- Always check if items exist in chest before attempting extraction
- Verify chest inventory contents before attempting to extract items

### Fuel management errors
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices regularly
- Keep coal supply available for critical power infrastructure
- Ensure boilers have sufficient fuel before they run empty

### Production bottleneck errors
- Monitor ingredient supply for assembling machines
- Ensure consistent supply of all required ingredients (iron gear wheels, copper plates)
- Set up reliable input material delivery systems

### Resource shortage warnings
- Address "out of fuel" warnings promptly
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain resource supply chain
- Maintain adequate fuel reserves for all burner-type equipment
